home: A student-athlete at Westford Academy, passionate about running, learning, and building software.

projects.title: Blackjack
projects.shortDescription: Designed and implemented a mostly full-featured Blackjack game in Java. Game includes an 8-deck shoe, card shuffling, hit/stay/double/split/surrender logic, betting, dealer play, win detection, and bankroll. Playable only via desktop Java due to GUI requirements. (I still need to port to JavaScript.) I purposefully only used AI for UI elements, as my goal was to practice more advanced object-oriented programming.
